Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.View.TUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, Runnable
public class TUI extends UI
Class that handles event with respect to CLI-clients.

  • Method Details

    • chooseInt

      private final int chooseInt(int min, int max)
      This method allows to receive the user's choice between min and max included, and it runs until a proper answer isn't given.
      Parameters:
      min -
      max -
      Returns:
      the number inserted in System.in and it is between min and max.

      Returns:

      Returns:
      the string inserted.

    • requestCard

      private void requestCard(int ID, Card[][] playedCards)
      Method to print the card with the specified ID. In order for it to be printed, the player must have been played it or having it in the objective cards.
      Parameters:
      ID -
      playedCards -

    • printGrid

      private void printGrid(Card[][] playedCards)
      Method to print the grid where the user can play a card. If a card can be placed in a certain position, it prints the spot with yellow, else with black. If a card is present in a position, it simply prints the card's ID colored by the card's color.
      Parameters:
      playedCards -

    • listenToChat

      private boolean listenToChat(String string)
      Method to check if the string is a chat command.
      Parameters:
      string -
      Returns:
      true if the string is a chat command.

      Returns:

    • update

      public final void update(GenericEvent event)
      Method to handle the incoming events, treating them with respect to their type.
      Parameters:
      event - the received event
      See Also:
      • GenericEvent

    • run

      public void run()
      Method that contains all the threads of this class. It handles the event filtered by the update method, and it also listens to strings inserted by the user such as command, requests' input etc.
